revised_title: Advanced Materials in the 1990s: A Review of New Ceramics and Ceramic Composites
tldr: This article discusses the current status, important aspects, and future prospects of new ceramics and ceramic composites in high-technology industries. It highlights the development of electronic ceramics, engineering ceramics, bioceramics, and optical ceramics, as well as ceramic composites like ceramic fiber-reinforced metals and ceramic-matrix composites. The article emphasizes the need for solving technological problems and introducing new ideas to improve the potential of these materials in the 1990s.
